actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home should not be further restricted.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home should not be further restricted.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home should not be further restricted.
